IntroductionÂ¶

This is a FastAPI project for managing user contacts with authentication, user verification, email services, and PostgreSQL backend.

Features include: - CRUD operations for contacts - User registration & login with JWT - Email verification - Rate limiting with Redis - Avatar upload support
